Text:

01 Albino Moon > Angel
02 Lost and Found > Turn the world Around
03 Hold me now > Vince Taylor
04 Colour Blind > I've just lost sombody
05 Will & Mercey > Sleepwalking
06 No for an answer > Need Her

08 Holy holy life > I Need Love
09 Angel > Kill Me
10 Turn the world around > Paradise in Distress
11 Vince Taylor > Albino Moon
12 I've just lost somebody > Lost and Found
13 Sleepwalking > Hold Me Now
14 Need her > Colourblind
15 I need love > Will and Mercey
16 Kill me > No For An Answer
17 Paradise in distress > Last Frontier Hotel
18 Hidden track > Holy Holy Life
